solution_line_template: Donny has {initial_money} - {kite_cost} = <<{initial_money}-{kite_cost}={money_after_kite}>>{money_after_kite} after paying for the kite.
He has {money_after_kite} - {frisbee_cost} = $<<{money_after_kite}-{frisbee_cost}={money_left}>>{money_left} left after buying the frisbee as well as the kite.
